title: Degavolver
text: Kicker  and/or  (You may pay an additional  and/or  as you cast this spell.)If Degavolver was kicked with its  kicker, it enters the battlefield with two +1/+1 counters on it and with "Pay 3 life: Regenerate Degavolver."If Degavolver was kicked with its  kicker, it enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it and with first strike.
